title: 改編歌詞<<what a parallel world>>

replies.msg:
朋友改編歌詞, 有無手足幫手唱出黎
一邊開槍射人一邊放曬煙花的平行世界
實在太令人心碎

原曲: What a wonderful world
歌手: Louis Armstrong

https://youtu.be/CWzrABouyeE

<<What a parallel world>>
I see popos of green, red chinese too
I see them shoot at me and you
And I think to myself what a parallel world
I see ribbons of blue and t-shirts of white
The gun-fired day, the dark blood-shed night
And I think to myself what a parallel world
The colors of the fireworks so pretty in the sky
Are also on the faces of people going by
I see foes shaking flags saying china loves you
They're really saying I love you
I hear people crying, I watch them growl
They'll learn much more than I'll never know
And I think to myself what a parallel world
Yes I think to myself what a parallel world

呢首歌咁經典
